data.title: Ron Glass, Emmy-Nominated Actor Best Known For 'Barney Miller,' Has Died At 71
data.meta_description: Glass died Friday of respiratory failure, his agent, Jeffrey Leavett, told The Associated Press. He appeared in dozens of shows in a television and film career dating to the early 1970s.
